sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useQuery, gql } from '@apollo/client'; import { useAuth } from '../utils/AuthContext'; import { XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, AreaChart, Area, RadarChart, PolarGrid, PolarAngleAxis, PolarRadiusAxis, Radar, BarChart, Bar } from 'recharts'; import { LogOut, Award, TrendingUp, Clock, Target, Activity } from 'lucide-react'; const GET_USER_DATA = gql` query GetUserData { user { id login transactions(where: {type: {_eq: "xp"}}, order_by: {createdAt: asc}) { amount createdAt path } progresses(order_by: {createdAt: asc}) { grade createdAt path } } } `; const Profile = () => { const { logout } = useAuth(); const { loading, error, data } = useQuery(GET_USER_DATA); if (loading) return (
Loading...
); if (error) return (
Error loading data
); const user = data?.user[0]; if (!user) return null; // Prepare data for charts const xpData = user.transactions.map(tx => ({ date: new Date(tx.createdAt).toLocaleDateString(), xp: tx.amount })); const totalXP = user.transactions.reduce((sum, tx) => sum + tx.amount, 0); const passedAudits = user.progresses.filter(p => p.grade > 0).length; const totalAudits = user.progresses.length; const auditRatio = totalAudits ? (passedAudits / totalAudits * 100).toFixed(1) : 0; // Skills radar data const skillsData = [ { subject: 'Problem Solving', A: 120, fullMark: 150 }, { subject: 'Algorithms', A: 98, fullMark: 150 }, { subject: 'Backend Dev', A: 86, fullMark: 150 }, { subject: 'Frontend Dev', A: 99, fullMark: 150 }, { subject: 'DevOps', A: 85, fullMark: 150 }, { subject: 'Database', A: 65, fullMark: 150 }, ]; // Project completion data const projectData = [ { name: 'Go', completed: 15, total: 20 }, { name: 'JavaScript', completed: 12, total: 15 }, { name: 'Python', completed: 8, total: 10 }, { name: 'Docker', completed: 5, total: 8 }, ]; return (
{/* Navigation */}
Learning Analytics

{user.login}

ID: {user.id}

{/* Stats Grid */}
{/* Stat cards with gradient backgrounds */}

Total XP

{totalXP.toLocaleString()}

Success Rate

{auditRatio}%

({passedAudits}/{totalAudits})

Projects Done

{user.progresses.length}

Learning Hours

{Math.round(totalXP / 1000)}

{/* Charts Grid */}
{/* XP Progress Chart */}

XP Progress

{/* Skills Radar Chart */}

Skills Overview

{/* Project Progress */}

Project Progress

); }; export default Profile;
